name: Nordland Mahjongg
description:
"Nordland Mahjongg" offers many hours of challenging gaming fun for both beginners and passionate Mahjongg players.

Enjoy different, hand-drawn tiles sets that can be coordinated with beautiful backgrounds.
Motifs from the Northland are available, as well as classic Chinese tiles and much more.
You can look forward to three different Mahjongg variants, selectable perspectives of the tile display and many different Mahjongg boards.

The program is also ideal for bridging short breaks in an entertaining way.

- 3 different Mahjong game variants
- Beautiful stone inserts and backgrounds
- Many different mahjongg boards and adjustment possibilities
- Choice of perspective and zoom
- Hours of challenging entertainment
